abstract: Director Gary Hustwit, who is best known for his groundbreaking documentary Helvetica, which is about a single typeface, takes a similar look at the design of cities in his latest film Urbanized.
snippet: Gary Hustwit’s film “Helvetica,” about a single typeface, was an unlikely documentary hit. His latest, “Urbanized,” looks at the design of cities.
lead_paragraph: Gary Hustwit’s film “Helvetica,” about a single typeface, was an unlikely documentary hit. His latest, “Urbanized,” looks at the design of cities.

headline.main: Making His Own Mark, Once Again
headline.print_headline: Making His Own Mark, Once Again
headline.seo: Gary Hustwit’s Documentaries on Design - Up Close
